```{r}
library(metalite)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(crosstalk)
library(boxly)
library(htmltools)
```

```{r}
meta <- meta_boxly()
meta
```

```{r}
outdata <- prepare_boxly(meta,
  population = "apat",
  observation = "wk12",
  parameter = "sodium;bili;urate",
  analysis = "lb_boxly"
)
```

```{r}
tmp1 <- outdata |> boxly()
tmp1
```
